name: Paracetamol 500mg Tablets
description: Provides effective relief from mild to moderate pain including headache, migraine, toothache, and sore throat. Also reduces fever.
dosageInstructions: Adults and children over 12 years: Take 1-2 tablets every 4-6 hours as needed. Do not exceed 8 tablets in 24 hours.
warnings: Do not take with any other paracetamol-containing products.
Consult a doctor if symptoms persist.

name: Ibuprofen 200mg
description: Targets pain and inflammation. Used for headaches, dental pain, period pain, and rheumatic pain.
dosageInstructions: Take 1 or 2 capsules with water, up to three times a day as required.
warnings: Do not take if you have a stomach ulcer.
Avoid use in late pregnancy.

name: Lemsip Max Cold & Flu
description: Hot lemon drink for the symptomatic relief of colds and flu.
dosageInstructions: Dissolve one sachet in a mug of hot water. Take one sachet every 4-6 hours.
warnings: Contains paracetamol. Do not take with other paracetamol products.

name: Vitamin C 1000mg Effervescent
description: Supports the immune system and helps reduce tiredness and fatigue.
dosageInstructions: Dissolve one tablet in a glass of water daily.
warnings: Do not exceed the recommended daily dose.
sideEffects: May cause stomach upset in high doses.

name: Cetaphil Gentle Skin Cleanser
description: A mild, non-irritating formulation that soothes skin as it cleans. For face and body.
dosageInstructions: Apply to skin and massage gently. Rinse with water.
warnings: For external use only.
Avoid contact with eyes.

name: Amoxicillin 500mg Capsules
description: A penicillin antibiotic that fights bacteria. Used to treat many different types of infection caused by bacteria, such as tonsillitis, bronchitis, pneumonia, and infections of the ear, nose, throat, skin, or urinary tract.
dosageInstructions: Take one capsule every 8 hours, or as directed by your doctor. Complete the full course.
warnings: Do not take if you are allergic to penicillin.
Inform your doctor of your full medical history.

name: Benylin Chesty Coughs (Non-Drowsy)
description: An expectorant to help loosen mucus and relieve chesty coughs.
dosageInstructions: Adults and children aged 12 years and over: Two 5 ml spoonfuls four times a day.
warnings: Do not use if you have a persistent cough such as occurs with smoking, asthma or emphysema.

name: Vitamin D3 2000 IU
description: Essential for calcium absorption, bone health, and immune function.
dosageInstructions: Take one capsule per day with your main meal.
warnings: Seek professional advice before using if you are under medical supervision.

name: Hydrocortisone Cream 1%
description: For the relief of mild to moderate eczema, dermatitis and insect bites. Reduces inflammation and itching.
dosageInstructions: Apply a thin layer to the affected area 1-2 times daily.
warnings: Do not use on the face for more than 7 days.
For external use only.

name: Aspirin 75mg Dispersible Tablets
description: Low-dose aspirin used to help prevent heart attacks and strokes in people at high risk.
dosageInstructions: Take one tablet daily, dispersed in water. Follow your doctor's advice.
warnings: Do not take if you have a history of stomach bleeding.

name: Sudafed Decongestant Liquid
description: Provides effective relief from nasal congestion, sinus pressure, and stuffy nose.
dosageInstructions: Adults and children over 12: 10ml every 4-6 hours. Children 6-12: 5ml every 4-6 hours.
warnings: Do not use for more than 7 days.
Consult your doctor if you have high blood pressure or heart disease.

name: Omega-3 Fish Oil 1200mg
description: Supports heart, brain, and eye health. High in EPA and DHA.
dosageInstructions: Take one to two capsules daily with food.
warnings: Consult your doctor before taking if you are on blood-thinning medication.

name: La Roche-Posay Anthelios SPF50+
description: Very high protection, broad-spectrum sunscreen for sensitive skin. Ultra-light fluid texture.
dosageInstructions: Apply generously to face and neck 30 minutes before sun exposure. Reapply frequently.
warnings: Over-exposure to the sun is dangerous.
Keep babies and young children out of direct sunlight.

name: Gaviscon Double Action Liquid
genericName: Sodium Alginate, Sodium Bicarbonate, Calcium Carbonate
description: Gets to work instantly, creating a protective barrier to help stop acid reflux and soothe indigestion.
dosageInstructions: Adults and children over 12: 10-20ml after meals and at bedtime.
warnings: Contains sodium, consult a doctor if you are on a low sodium diet.
contraindications: High levels of calcium in the blood

name: Zyrtec Allergy Relief Tablets
description: 24-hour relief from hay fever and other allergy symptoms like sneezing, runny nose, and itchy, watery eyes.
dosageInstructions: Adults and children 6 years and over: One 10 mg tablet once daily.
warnings: May cause drowsiness. Do not drive or operate heavy machinery.

name: Magnesium Citrate 400mg
description: Supports muscle and nerve function, energy production, and bone health. Highly absorbable form of magnesium.
dosageInstructions: Take 2 tablets daily with a meal.
warnings: High doses may have a laxative effect.

name: E45 Dermatological Cream
genericName: Light Liquid Paraffin, White Soft Paraffin, Anhydrous Lanolin
description: An effective emollient for dry skin conditions such as eczema and dermatitis. Clinically proven to soothe and hydrate dry, itchy skin.
dosageInstructions: Apply to the affected area 2 or 3 times daily.
warnings: Do not use if allergic to any of the ingredients. Can make fabrics more flammable.

name: Co-codamol 8/500 Tablets
description: For the short-term treatment of acute moderate pain that is not relieved by other painkillers such as paracetamol or ibuprofen alone.
dosageInstructions: Adults: 2 tablets every 4 hours. Do not take for more than 3 days without consulting a doctor.
warnings: Can cause addiction. Contains opioid.
Do not take with other paracetamol products.

name: Olbas Oil Inhalant Decongestant
genericName: Cajuput Oil, Clove Oil, Eucalyptus Oil, Peppermint Oil
description: Natural essential oils for the relief of bronchial and nasal congestion caused by colds, flu, and hay fever.
dosageInstructions: Add 2-3 drops to a tissue for inhalation. For children 3 months to 2 years, add 1 drop to a tissue and place out of reach.
warnings: Not to be taken internally.
Avoid contact with skin and eyes.

name: Perfectil Original Triple Active
description: A comprehensive multivitamin supplement with biotin, zinc, and selenium to support healthy skin, hair, and nails from within.
dosageInstructions: One tablet per day with your main meal. Swallow with water.
warnings: Food supplements must not replace a varied and balanced diet.
This product contains iron, which if taken in excess may be harmful to young children.

name: Bio-Oil Skincare Oil
description: A specialist skincare product that helps improve the appearance of scars, stretch marks, and uneven skin tone. Also effective for aging and dehydrated skin.
dosageInstructions: Apply twice daily for a minimum of 3 months. Massage in a circular motion until fully absorbed.
warnings: For external use only.
Do not use on broken skin.

name: Loratadine 10mg Tablets
description: Non-drowsy antihistamine for the relief of allergy symptoms such as hay fever, dust allergies, and pet allergies.
dosageInstructions: Adults and children over 12 years: One tablet daily.
warnings: Do not exceed the stated dose.

name: Voltarol Pain Relief Gel
description: A topical anti-inflammatory gel for the relief of pain in muscles, joints, tendons and ligaments.
dosageInstructions: Gently rub 2-4g of gel into the skin of the affected area 3-4 times daily.
warnings: Do not use on broken skin.
Avoid contact with eyes.
contraindications: Allergy to diclofenac, aspirin, or other NSAIDs

name: Strepsils Honey & Lemon Lozenges
description: Soothing lozenges for the relief of discomfort caused by sore throats.
dosageInstructions: Dissolve one lozenge slowly in the mouth every 2-3 hours.
warnings: Do not exceed the stated dose.

name: Wellwoman Original Capsules
description: A comprehensive spectrum of micronutrients for all-round nutritional support including vitamins B6, B12 and iron which contribute to normal energy release.
dosageInstructions: One capsule per day with your main meal.
warnings: This product contains iron, which if taken in excess, may be harmful to very young children.

name: CeraVe SA Smoothing Cleanser
description: Gently cleanses and exfoliates to remove dirt and oil while smoothing rough and bumpy skin. With 3 essential ceramides, salicylic acid & hyaluronic acid.
dosageInstructions: Massage cleanser onto wet skin. Rinse. Suitable for face and body.
warnings: Avoid direct contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse thoroughly with water.

name: Imodium Instants
description: For the fast and effective relief of diarrhoea. Tablets dissolve instantly on the tongue for on-the-go relief.
dosageInstructions: Adults and children over 12: 2 tablets initially, followed by 1 tablet after each loose stool. Max 6 tablets in 24 hours.
warnings: Do not use for more than 48 hours without consulting a doctor.
contraindications: High fever or blood in stool

name: Night Nurse Liquid
description: Complete night-time relief from the symptoms of colds and flu, to help you get a good night's sleep.
dosageInstructions: One 20ml dose to be taken at bedtime.
warnings: May cause marked drowsiness. Do not drive or operate machinery.
Contains alcohol.
Do not take if you are already taking other paracetamol products.

name: Feroglobin Liquid
description: A gentle iron supplement with zinc and B vitamins, formulated to deliver an optimum amount of iron to the body while remaining gentle on the stomach.
dosageInstructions: Adults: 1 teaspoonful 2 times daily. Children (3-12 years): 1 teaspoonful daily.
warnings: Food supplements must not replace a varied diet.
This product contains iron, which can be harmful to children if taken in large doses.

name: Canesten Thrush Cream
description: An effective cream for treating external symptoms of thrush, such as itching and soreness.
dosageInstructions: Apply the cream to the affected area 2 to 3 times a day and rub in gently.
warnings: For external use only.
If symptoms persist for more than 7 days, consult your doctor.

name: Deep Heat Rub
description: A pain-relieving rub that generates deep, penetrating warmth for muscular aches and pains.
dosageInstructions: Gently massage into the affected area until the cream is rubbed in.
warnings: Do not use on children under 5.
Avoid contact with eyes and sensitive skin areas.

name: Otrivine Adult Nasal Spray
description: A nasal decongestant that provides fast, effective relief from a blocked nose caused by colds, flu, or sinusitis.
dosageInstructions: One spray into each nostril 2 or 3 times daily.
warnings: Do not use continuously for more than 7 consecutive days.

name: Pro-Ven Probiotics Adult 25 Billion
description: High-strength probiotic capsules to support digestive health, immune function, and overall well-being. Contains the Lab4 blend of friendly bacteria.
dosageInstructions: Take one capsule daily with food.
warnings: Store in a cool, dry place.
sideEffects: May cause initial bloating or gas

name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Water Gel
description: An oil-free, lightweight water gel that instantly quenches dry skin and boosts hydration. Contains hyaluronic acid.
dosageInstructions: Apply evenly to face and neck after cleansing.
warnings: For external use only.

name: Rennie Peppermint Tablets
description: Fast-acting relief from heartburn and indigestion. Neutralises excess stomach acid.
dosageInstructions: Suck or chew 1 to 2 tablets as required, up to a maximum of 11 tablets a day.
warnings: Do not take for long periods without consulting a doctor.

name: Beconase Hayfever Relief Nasal Spray
description: Provides effective, long-lasting relief from hay fever symptoms by reducing inflammation in the nose.
dosageInstructions: Adults aged 18 and over: Two sprays into each nostril every morning and evening.
warnings: Use regularly for maximum effect.
Consult a doctor if symptoms do not improve after 14 days.

name: Glucosamine Sulphate 1500mg
description: High-strength supplement to support cartilage and joint health. Often taken by those with active lifestyles.
dosageInstructions: Swallow one tablet daily with water.
warnings: Not suitable for those with an allergy to shellfish.

name: Savlon Antiseptic Cream
description: First aid cream to cleanse and help prevent infection from minor cuts, grazes, and burns.
dosageInstructions: Apply a small amount to the affected area.
warnings: For external use only. Keep out of eyes and ears.

name: Anusol Cream
genericName: Zinc Oxide, Bismuth Oxide, Balsam Peru
description: Provides effective, soothing relief from the pain and discomfort associated with haemorrhoids (piles).
dosageInstructions: Apply to the affected area in the morning, at night, and after each bowel movement.
warnings: If you are pregnant or breastfeeding, consult your doctor before use.

name: Calpol Infant Suspension
description: Sugar-free strawberry flavoured oral suspension for pain and fever relief for babies and infants.
dosageInstructions: 2-3 months: 2.5ml up to twice daily. 3-6 months: 2.5ml up to 4 times daily. 6-24 months: 5ml up to 4 times daily.
warnings: Do not give to babies under 2 months old.
Contains Paracetamol. Do not give with any other paracetamol-containing products.

name: Cod Liver Oil 1000mg
description: A rich source of Omega-3, Vitamin D, and Vitamin A. Supports bones, vision, and immune system.
dosageInstructions: One capsule a day with a cold drink.
warnings: Do not take if you are pregnant or likely to become pregnant except on the advice of a doctor.

name: TCP Antiseptic Liquid
description: A soothing antiseptic liquid for sore throats, mouth ulcers, cuts, grazes, bites, and stings.
dosageInstructions: For gargling/mouthwash, dilute 1 part TCP with 5 parts water. For cuts, dilute 1:1 with water and apply.
warnings: Do not swallow undiluted.
Has a strong characteristic smell.

name: Buscopan IBS Relief
description: Provides targeted relief from the pain and discomfort of abdominal cramps associated with Irritable Bowel Syndrome (IBS).
dosageInstructions: Adults and children 12 years or over: Start with 1 tablet 3 times a day. Can be increased to 2 tablets 4 times a day if needed.
warnings: Only for use in medically confirmed IBS.
Consult your doctor if symptoms worsen or do not improve after 2 weeks.

name: Vicks First Defence Nasal Spray
description: A micro-gel nasal spray designed to trap, inactivate and help remove cold viruses when used at the first signs of a cold.
dosageInstructions: Apply 2-3 sprays per nostril up to 4 times a day. Tilt head backwards and avoid inhaling deeply.
warnings: For use at the first signs of a cold. Not suitable for children under 12.

name: Daktarin Aktiv Cream
description: Effective treatment for athlete's foot. An antifungal cream that fights the cause and relieves the symptoms.
dosageInstructions: Apply to the infected area twice daily. Continue for 10 days after symptoms have cleared.
warnings: For external use only.
Avoid contact with eyes.
